text: Remember Me is a 1979 American short documentary film produced by Dick Young, that was filmed in the US, the Middle East and Asia.Pyramid Media It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short.William Shatner and Persis Khambatta present Documentary Oscars in 1980-Oscars on YouTube1980|Oscars.org ==Summary== Documenting and contrasting children's youthful beauty with the squalor, hardship and wasted potential of their daily lives; students learning how their counterparts really live and are encouraged to think about what these children need to thrive.Pyramid MediaLetterboxd ==References== ==External links== * Category:1979 films Category:1979 documentary films Category:1979 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films
